citations.narrative:
There were no records of acquisition or record of animals on hand available at the time of inspection for the eleven pet
bird species at the facility . Additionally, there were no records of acquisition or disposition for one African dormouse and
two prairie dogs which had been sold within the past several months. Complete and accurate animal records must be kept
current to facilitate identification and tracking of animals as well as ensure their health and well-being. Records must be
maintained which fully and correctly disclose all the required information concerning all animals purchased or otherwise
acquired, owned, held, leased, transported, sold, euthanized or otherwise disposed of and shall include any offspring born
or hatched while in the licensee’s possession.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1)  Repeat
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
There were no records of acquisition or record of animals on hand available at the time of inspection for the eleven pet 
bird species at the facility . Additionally, there were no records of acquisition or disposition for one African dormouse and 
two prairie dogs which had been sold within the past several months. Complete and accurate animal records must be kept 
current to facilitate identification and tracking of animals as well as ensure their health and well-being. Records must be 
maintained which fully and correctly disclose all the required information concerning all animals purchased or otherwise 
acquired, owned, held, leased, transported, sold, euthanized or otherwise disposed of and shall include any offspring born 
or hatched while in the licensee’s possession. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
